claims.claim: Processes 14 trillion+ tokens efficiently for training Falcon models
claims.quote: Processes 14 trillion+ tokens efficiently, enabling the training of the latest Falcon models

claims.claim: AI models process 1,000+ tokens per second with Cloud GPUs
claims.quote: Supercharges LLM training with Cloud GPUs, enabling AI models capable of processing 1,000+ tokens per second

claims.claim: GPU utilization rates doubled compared to managed services
claims.quote: GPU utilization rates are double what they would have been with a managed service

claims.claim: Accelerated go-to-market times by streamlining environment
claims.quote: Accelerates go-to-market times by streamlining the environment to deliver robust, mature products ready for users
Dr. Hacid and his team have been able to speed up training runs dramatically, and the AI models are showing excellent results

claims.claim: Models measured processing more than a thousand tokens per second
claims.quote: With Cloud GPUs, TII's models have been measured processing more than a thousand tokens per second

claims.claim: Delivers reliability at scale for uninterrupted training runs
claims.quote: Delivers reliability at scale, ensuring uninterrupted training runs for even the largest LLMs

claims.claim: Unlocked serious efficiency gains through Google Cloud support
claims.quote: Google Cloud has helped us to unlock some serious efficiency gains
